messages.message:
@Nidhi @achao @Heymian

there appears to be some type of bad state with file service. none of the notebook containers are running correctly as they try to fetch the ipynb files from instabase.com (http://instabase.com) via the file apis which i believe is internally invoking grpc based file service

```[I 2021-05-26 08:04:23.591 SingleUserNotebookApp log:49] 302 GET /user/ashish-nb/tree/ashish/my-playground/fs/Instabase%20Drive/notebooks/demo.ipynb (10.48.9.5) 800.72ms
Future exception was never retrieved
future: <Future finished exception=HTTPError()>
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/depot/build/py/instabase/notebook/services/contents/filemanager.py", line 37, in wrapper
    return f(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/depot/build/py/instabase/notebook/services/contents/filemanager.py", line 412, in get
    model = self._notebook_model(path, content=content)
  File "/depot/build/py/instabase/notebook/services/contents/filemanager.py", line 391, in _notebook_model
    raise IOError('{0}'.format(json_resp.get('msg')))
OSError: [File_service_v2 Enabled] - Stat RPC error: Error occurred executing GRPC method: Retrying b'/file_service.FileService/Stat' request in 1.5s due to StatusCode DEADLINE_EXCEEDED, Error (4, 'deadline exceeded'), Message Deadline Exceeded. Retries left 0

During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/mnt/disks/notebook-disk/conda/current/envs/python3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/tornado/gen.py", line 209, in wrapper
    yielded = next(result)
  File "/mnt/disks/notebook-disk/conda/current/envs/python3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/notebook/notebook/handlers.py", line 84, in get
    model = yield maybe_future(cm.get(path, content=False))
  File "/depot/build/py/instabase/notebook/services/contents/filemanager.py", line 41, in wrapper
    raise HTTPError(400, str(e))
tornado.web.HTTPError: HTTP 400: Bad Request ([File_service_v2 Enabled] - Stat RPC error: Error occurred executing GRPC method: Retrying b'/file_service.FileService/Stat' request in 1.5s due to StatusCode DEADLINE_EXCEEDED, Error (4, 'deadline exceeded'), Message Deadline Exceeded. Retries left 0)```
Thanks @Ashish! We are looking into this as part of the prod issue Lee reported above.

ok thank you

cc @Naveen for reference
